controlEnvironment.principle: COSO Principle 1: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.

pof.title: Sets the Tone at the Top
pof.requirement: The board of directors and management demonstrate the importance of integrity and ethical values.

pof.title: Establishes Standards of Conduct
pof.requirement: The expectations are defined in standards of conduct and understood at all levels.

pof.title: Evaluates Adherence to Standards of Conduct
pof.requirement: Processes evaluate individuals and teams against expected standards.

pof.title: Addresses Deviations in a Timely Manner
pof.requirement: Deviations are identified and remedied in a timely and consistent manner.

pof.title: Considers Contractors and Vendor Employees in Demonstrating Its Commitment
pof.requirement: Includes contractors and vendors in standards of conduct processes.

controlEnvironment.principle: COSO Principle 2: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight of internal control development and performance.

pof.title: Establishes Oversight Responsibilities
pof.requirement: The board identifies and accepts oversight responsibilities.

pof.title: Applies Relevant Expertise
pof.requirement: The board defines and evaluates skills and expertise needed among its members.

pof.title: Operates Independently
pof.requirement: The board has sufficient independent members for objective evaluations.

pof.title: Supplements Board Expertise
pof.requirement: The board supplements expertise in security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy as needed.

controlEnvironment.principle: COSO Principle 3: Management establishes, with board oversight, structures, reporting lines, and appropriate authorities and responsibilities in the pursuit of objectives.

pof.title: Considers All Structures of the Entity
pof.requirement: Management considers multiple structures used to support objectives.

pof.title: Establishes Reporting Lines
pof.requirement: Management designs lines of reporting to enable execution of authorities.

pof.title: Defines, Assigns, and Limits Authorities and Responsibilities
pof.requirement: Management delegates authority and segregates duties.

pof.title: Addresses Specific Requirements When Defining Authorities and Responsibilities
pof.requirement: Considers requirements for security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy.

pof.title: Considers Interactions With External Parties
pof.requirement: Considers interactions with and monitoring of external parties.

pof.title: Establishes Structures, Reporting Lines, and Authorities to Support Compliance With Legal and Contractual Privacy Requirements

controlEnvironment.principle: COSO Principle 4: The entity demonstrates a commitment to attract, develop, and retain competent individuals in alignment with objectives.

pof.title: Establishes Policies and Practices
pof.requirement: Policies reflect necessary competence to support objectives.

pof.title: Evaluates Competence and Addresses Shortcomings
pof.requirement: Evaluates competence across entity and outsourced providers.

pof.title: Attracts, Develops, and Retains Individuals
pof.requirement: Provides mentoring and training to attract and retain personnel.

pof.title: Plans and Prepares for Succession
pof.requirement: Develops contingency plans for key responsibilities.

pof.title: Considers the Technical Competency of Individuals
pof.requirement: Evaluates technical skills of personnel and vendors.

pof.title: Provides Training to Maintain Technical Competencies

controlEnvironment.principle: COSO Principle 5: The entity holds individuals accountable for their internal control responsibilities in the pursuit of objectives.

pof.title: Enforces Accountability Through Structures, Authorities, and Responsibilities
Establishes Performance Measures, Incentives, and Rewards
pof.requirement: Establishes measures reflecting standards of conduct.

pof.title: Evaluates Performance Measures, Incentives, and Rewards for Ongoing Relevance
pof.requirement: Aligns incentives with internal control responsibilities.

pof.title: Considers Excessive Pressures
pof.requirement: Evaluates and adjusts pressures associated with objectives.

pof.title: Evaluates Performance and Rewards or Disciplines Individuals
pof.requirement: Evaluates performance and provides rewards or discipline.

pof.title: Takes Disciplinary Actions
pof.requirement: For privacy violations or negligence causing privacy incidents.

informationAndCommunication.principle: COSO Principle 13: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information to support the functioning of internal control.

pof.title: Identifies Information Requirements
pof.requirement: Identifies information needed to support internal control components.

pof.title: Captures Internal and External Sources of Data
Maintains Quality Throughout Processing
pof.requirement: Systems produce timely, accurate, accessible, and protected information.

pof.title: Documents Data Flow
pof.requirement: Documents and uses data flows to support controls.

pof.title: Manages Assets
pof.requirement: Identifies, documents, and maintains records of system components.

pof.title: Classifies Information
pof.requirement: Classifies information by relevant characteristics to support control design.

pof.title: Uses Information That Is Complete and Accurate
pof.requirement: Uses valid information in control operation.

pof.title: Manages the Location of Assets
pof.requirement: Tracks physical location of information assets, especially those stored externally.

informationAndCommunication.principle: COSO Principle 14: The entity internally communicates information, including objectives and responsibilities for internal control, necessary to support the functioning of internal control.

pof.title: Communicates Internal Control Information
pof.requirement: Communicates information for internal control responsibilities.

pof.title: Communicates With the Board of Directors
pof.requirement: Provides information for board oversight roles.

pof.title: Provides Separate Communication Lines
pof.requirement: Establishes separate channels for anonymous communication.

pof.title: Selects Relevant Method of Communication
pof.requirement: Considers timing, audience, and nature of information.

pof.title: Communicates Responsibilities
pof.requirement: Informs personnel about system control responsibilities.

pof.title: Communicates Information on Reporting Failures, Incidents, Concerns, and Other Matters
Communicates Objectives and Changes to Objectives
pof.requirement: Informs personnel of objectives and changes.

pof.title: Communicates Information to Improve Security Knowledge and Awareness
Communicates Information to Improve Privacy Knowledge and Awareness
Communicates Incident Reporting Methods
pof.requirement: Informs of process to report suspected privacy incidents.

pof.title: Communicates Information About System Operation and Boundaries
Communicates System Objectives
pof.requirement: Communicates objectives to enable personnel to fulfill responsibilities.

informationAndCommunication.principle: COSO Principle 15: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control.

pof.title: Communicates to External Parties
pof.requirement: Communicates relevant information to external parties.

pof.title: Enables Inbound Communications
pof.requirement: Allows input from external parties via communication channels.

pof.title: Communicates With the Board of Directors
pof.requirement: Reports external assessment results to the board.

pof.title: Provides Separate Communication Lines
pof.requirement: Establishes anonymous communication channels for external parties.

pof.title: Selects Relevant Method of Communication
pof.requirement: Considers timing, audience, nature, and legal requirements.

pof.title: Communicates Objectives Related to Confidentiality and Changes to Those Objectives
Communicates Objectives Related to Privacy and Changes to Those Objectives
Communicates Incident Reporting Methods
pof.requirement: Provides process for reporting suspected privacy incidents.

pof.title: Communicates Information About System Operation and Boundaries
Communicates System Responsibilities
pof.requirement: To external users with system responsibilities.

pof.title: Communicates Information on Reporting System Failures, Incidents, Concerns, and Other Matters

riskAssessment.principle: COSO Principle 6: The entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable the identification and assessment of risks relating to objectives.

pof.title: Operations Objectives
pof.requirement: Reflect management choices, consider risk tolerances, include performance goals, form basis for resource commitment.

pof.title: External Financial Reporting Objectives
pof.requirement: Comply with accounting standards, consider materiality, reflect entity activities.

pof.title: External Nonfinancial Reporting Objectives
pof.requirement: Comply with external frameworks, consider precision requirements, reflect entity activities.

pof.title: Internal Reporting Objectives
pof.requirement: Reflect management choices, consider precision requirements, reflect entity activities.

pof.title: Compliance Objectives
pof.requirement: Reflect external laws and regulations, consider risk tolerances.

pof.title: Establishes Sub-Objectives for Risk Assessment
pof.requirement: Identifies sub-objectives for security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, or privacy.

riskAssessment.principle: COSO Principle 7: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives across the entity and analyzes risks as a basis for determining how the risks should be managed.

pof.title: Includes Entity, Subsidiary, Division, Operating Unit, and Functional Levels
pof.requirement: Identifies risks at all relevant levels.

pof.title: Analyzes Internal and External Factors
pof.requirement: Considers impact of factors on objectives.

pof.title: Involves Appropriate Levels of Management
pof.requirement: Includes appropriate management in risk assessment.

pof.title: Determines How to Respond to Risks
pof.requirement: Decides whether to accept, avoid, reduce, or share risks.

pof.title: Identifies Threats to Objectives
pof.requirement: Identifies threats from intentional and unintentional acts and events.

pof.title: Identifies Vulnerability of System Components
pof.requirement: Identifies vulnerabilities in infrastructure, software, and assets.

pof.title: Analyzes Threats and Vulnerabilities From Vendors, Business Partners, and Other Parties
Assesses the Significance of the Risks
pof.requirement: Analyzes criticality, susceptibility, likelihood, magnitude, and develops mitigations.

riskAssessment.principle: COSO Principle 8: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks to the achievement of objectives.

pof.title: Considers Various Types of Fraud
pof.requirement: Considers fraudulent reporting, asset loss, and corruption.

pof.title: Assesses Incentives and Pressures
pof.requirement: Considers incentives and pressures for fraud.

pof.title: Assesses Attitudes and Rationalizations
pof.requirement: Considers how personnel might justify inappropriate actions.

pof.title: Considers the Risks Related to the Use of IT and Access to Information

riskAssessment.principle: COSO Principle 9: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system of internal control.

pof.title: Assesses Changes in the External Environment
pof.requirement: Considers regulatory, economic, and physical environment changes.

pof.title: Assesses Changes in the Business Model
pof.requirement: Considers impacts of business changes on internal control.

pof.title: Assesses Changes in Leadership
pof.requirement: Considers changes in management attitudes toward internal control.

pof.title: Assesses Changes in Systems and Technology
Assesses Changes in Vendor and Business Partner Relationships
Assesses Changes in Threats and Vulnerabilities
pof.requirement: Evaluates changing threats to system components.

monitoringActivities.principle: COSO Principle 16: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning.

pof.title: Considers a Mix of Ongoing and Separate Evaluations
Considers Rate of Change
pof.requirement: Considers business change rate when developing evaluations.

pof.title: Establishes Baseline Understanding
pof.requirement: Uses system design as evaluation baseline.

pof.title: Uses Knowledgeable Personnel
pof.requirement: Ensures evaluators understand what they're evaluating.

pof.title: Integrates With Business Processes
pof.requirement: Builds ongoing evaluations into business processes.

pof.title: Adjusts Scope and Frequency
pof.requirement: Varies evaluation scope based on risk.

pof.title: Objectively Evaluates
pof.requirement: Performs periodic separate evaluations for objective feedback.

pof.title: Considers Different Types of Ongoing and Separate Evaluations

monitoringActivities.principle: COSO Principle 17: The entity evaluates and communicates internal control deficiencies in a timely manner to those parties responsible for taking corrective action, including senior management and the board of directors, as appropriate.

pof.title: Assesses Results
pof.requirement: Management and the board assess evaluation results.

controlActivities.principle: COSO Principle 10: The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks to the achievement of objectives to acceptable levels.

pof.title: Integrates With Risk Assessment
pof.requirement: Control activities address and mitigate risks.

pof.title: Considers Entity-Specific Factors
pof.requirement: Considers environment and organizational characteristics in control selection.

pof.title: Evaluates a Mix of Control Activity Types
pof.requirement: Uses various control types including manual, automated, preventive, and detective.

pof.title: Considers at What Level Activities Are Applied
pof.requirement: Implements controls at various entity levels.

pof.title: Addresses Segregation of Duties
pof.requirement: Segregates incompatible duties or develops alternative controls.

controlActivities.principle: COSO Principle 11: The entity also selects and develops general control activities over technology to support the achievement of objectives.

pof.title: Determines Dependency Between the Use of Technology in Business Processes and Technology General Controls
pof.requirement: Understands linkage between processes and controls.

pof.title: Establishes Relevant Technology Infrastructure Control Activities
pof.requirement: Implements controls over infrastructure for completeness, accuracy, and availability.

pof.title: Establishes Relevant Security Management Process Controls Activities
pof.requirement: Implements access controls based on job responsibilities.

pof.title: Establishes Relevant Technology Acquisition, Development, and Maintenance Process Control Activities

controlActivities.principle: COSO Principle 12: The entity deploys control activities through policies that establish what is expected and in procedures that put policies into action.

pof.title: Establishes Policies and Procedures to Support Deployment of Management's Directives
pof.requirement: Creates policies and procedures for control activities.

pof.title: Establishes Responsibility and Accountability for Executing Policies and Procedures
Performs in a Timely Manner
pof.requirement: Performs control activities in accordance with policy timelines.

pof.title: Takes Corrective Action
pof.requirement: Investigates and acts on control execution issues.

pof.title: Performs Using Competent Personnel
pof.requirement: Uses skilled personnel with authority for control activities.

pof.title: Reassesses Policies and Procedures
pof.requirement: Reviews control relevance and updates as needed.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets to protect them from security events to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Identifies and Manages the Inventory of Information Assets
Assesses New Architectures
pof.requirement: Evaluates security of new architectures before implementation.

pof.title: Restricts Logical Access
pof.requirement: Restricts access to assets through access control mechanisms.

pof.title: Identifies and Authenticates Users
pof.requirement: Verifies identity of users, infrastructure, and software.

pof.title: Considers Network Segmentation
pof.requirement: Isolates portions of the network based on risk.

pof.title: Manages Points of Access
pof.requirement: Identifies and controls external access points.

pof.title: Restricts Access to Information Assets
pof.requirement: Establishes access rules using data classification.

pof.title: Manages Credentials for Infrastructure and Software
pof.requirement: Controls access credentials for system components.

pof.title: Uses Encryption to Protect Data
pof.requirement: Implements encryption based on risk assessment.

pof.title: Protects Cryptographic Keys
pof.requirement: Secures keys during generation, storage, use, and destruction.

pof.title: Restricts Access to and Use of Confidential Information for Identified Purposes
Restricts Access to and the Use of Personal Information

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: Prior to issuing system credentials and granting system access, the entity registers and authorizes new internal and external users whose access is administered by the entity. For those users whose access is administered by the entity, user system credentials are removed when user access is no longer authorized.

pof.title: Creates Access Credentials to Protected Information Assets
Prevents the Use of Credentials When No Longer Valid

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity authorizes, modifies, or removes access to data, software, functions, and other protected information assets based on roles, responsibilities, or the system design and changes, giving consideration to the concepts of least privilege and segregation of duties, to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Creates or Modifies Access to Protected Information Assets
Removes Access to Protected Information Assets
Uses Access Control Structures
pof.requirement: Implements role-based access controls and segregation of duties.

pof.title: Reviews Access Roles and Rules
pof.requirement: Periodically reviews and modifies access configurations.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity restricts physical access to facilities and protected information assets (for example, data center facilities, backup media storage, and other sensitive locations) to authorized personnel to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Removes Physical Access
pof.requirement: Processes for removing unnecessary physical access.

pof.title: Recovers Physical Devices
pof.requirement: Processes for recovering entity devices when access is terminated.

pof.title: Reviews Physical Access
pof.requirement: Periodically reviews physical access for appropriateness.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity discontinues logical and physical protections over physical assets only after the ability to read or recover data and software from those assets has been diminished and is no longer required to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Removes Data and Software for Disposal
pof.requirement: Renders data and software inaccessible before disposal.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity implements logical access security measures to protect against threats from sources outside its system boundaries.

pof.title: Requires Additional Authentication or Credentials
pof.requirement: Implements additional authentication for external access.

pof.title: Implements Boundary Protection Systems
pof.requirement: Configures firewalls and other security systems.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity restricts the transmission, movement, and removal of information to authorized internal and external users and processes, and protects it during transmission, movement, or removal to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Restricts the Ability to Perform Transmission
pof.requirement: Uses data loss prevention to control data movement.

pof.title: Uses Encryption Technologies or Secure Communication Channels to Protect Data
Protects Removal Media
pof.requirement: Secures removable media through encryption and physical protections.

pof.title: Protects Endpoint Devices
pof.requirement: Implements controls for mobile devices, laptops, and other endpoints.

logicalAndPhysicalAccessControls.principle: The entity implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon the introduction of unauthorized or malicious software to meet the entity's objectives.

pof.title: Restricts Installation and Modification of Application and Software
Detects Unauthorized Changes to Software and Configuration Parameters
Uses a Defined Change Control Process
pof.requirement: Manages software implementation through change control.

pof.title: Scans Information Assets From Outside the Entity for Malware and Other Unauthorized Software

systemOperations.principle: To meet its objectives, the entity uses detection and monitoring procedures to identify (1) changes to configurations that result in the introduction of new vulnerabilities, and (2) susceptibilities to newly discovered vulnerabilities.

pof.title: Implements Change-Detection Mechanisms
pof.requirement: Uses tools to detect unauthorized modifications.

pof.title: Conducts Vulnerability Scans
pof.requirement: Performs scans and remediation after changes.

systemOperations.principle: The entity monitors system components and the operation of those components for anomalies that are indicative of malicious acts, natural disasters, and errors affecting the entity's ability to meet its objectives; anomalies are analyzed to determine whether they represent security events.

pof.title: Implements Detection Policies, Procedures, and Tools
Designs Detection Measures
pof.requirement: Designs controls to identify various types of anomalies.

pof.title: Monitors Detection Tools for Effective Operation

systemOperations.principle: The entity evaluates security events to determine whether they could or have resulted in a failure of the entity to meet its objectives (security incidents) and, if so, takes actions to prevent or address such failures.

pof.title: Communicates and Reviews Detected Security Events
Develops and Implements Procedures to Analyze Security Incidents
Assesses the Impact on Confidential Information
pof.requirement: Evaluates unauthorized disclosure of confidential information.

pof.title: Determines Confidential Information Used or Disclosed
pof.requirement: Identifies affected information and addresses control failures.

pof.title: Assesses the Impact on Personal Information
pof.requirement: Evaluates unauthorized disclosure of personal information.

pof.title: Determines Personal Information Used or Disclosed
pof.requirement: Identifies affected personal information and addresses failures.

systemOperations.principle: The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident-response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.

pof.title: Contains and Responds to Security Incidents
Resolves Security Incidents
pof.requirement: Addresses vulnerabilities and removes unauthorized access.

pof.title: Develops and Implements Communication of Security Incidents
Obtains Understanding of Nature of Incident and Determines Containment Strategy
Evaluates the Effectiveness of Incident Response
Periodically Evaluates Incidents
pof.requirement: Reviews incidents to identify needed system changes.

pof.title: Applies Breach Response Procedures
pof.requirement: Implements defined procedures for privacy incidents.

pof.title: Communicates Unauthorized Use and Disclosure
pof.requirement: Informs required parties of privacy breaches.

pof.title: Application of Sanctions
pof.requirement: Evaluates conduct of involved parties and applies sanctions as needed.

systemOperations.principle: The entity identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from identified security incidents.

pof.title: Determines Root Cause of the Incident
Implements Changes to Prevent and Detect Recurrences

changeManagement.principle: The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.

pof.title: Manages Changes Throughout the System Life Cycle
Authorizes Changes
pof.requirement: Approves changes before design or acquisition.

pof.title: Deploys System Changes
pof.requirement: Implements changes with segregation of responsibilities.

pof.title: Identifies Changes in Infrastructure, Data, Software, and Procedures Required to Remediate Incidents
pof.requirement: Initiates change process for incident remediation.

pof.title: Creates Baseline Configuration of IT Technology
Provides for Changes Necessary in Emergency Situations
Manages Patch Changes
pof.requirement: Manages patches for infrastructure and software.

riskMitigation.principle: The entity identifies, selects, and develops risk mitigation activities for risks arising from potential business disruptions.

pof.title: Considers Mitigation of Risks of Business Disruption
Considers the Use of Insurance to Mitigate Financial Impact Risks

riskMitigation.principle: The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.

pof.title: Establishes Requirements for Vendor and Business Partner Engagements
Identifies Vulnerabilities
pof.requirement: Evaluates risks from third-party system access.

pof.title: Assesses Vendor and Business Partner Risks
Assigns Responsibility and Accountability for Managing Vendors and Business Partners
Establishes Communication Protocols for Vendors and Business Partners
Establishes Exception Handling Procedures From Vendors and Business Partners
Assesses Vendor and Business Partner Performance
Implements Procedures for Addressing Issues Identified During Vendor and Business Partner Assessments
Implements Procedures for Terminating Vendor and Business Partner Relationships
Obtains Confidentiality Commitments From Vendors and Business Partners
Assesses Compliance With Confidentiality Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners
Obtains Privacy Commitments From Vendors and Business Partners
Assesses Compliance With Privacy Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners

availability.principle: The entity maintains, monitors, and evaluates current processing capacity and use of system components (infrastructure, data, and software) to manage capacity demand and to enable the implementation of additional capacity to help meet its objectives.

pof.title: Forecasts Capacity
pof.requirement: Projects usage against capacity and tolerances.

availability.principle: The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections, software, data backup processes, and recovery infrastructure to meet its objectives.

pof.title: Implements and Maintains Environmental Protection Mechanisms
Communicates and Reviews Detected Environmental Threat Events
Performs Data Backup
pof.requirement: Implements backup procedures and monitors failures.

pof.title: Addresses Offsite Storage
pof.requirement: Stores backups at appropriate distance from primary location.

pof.title: Considers Data Recoverability
pof.requirement: Identifies and mitigates threats to data recovery.

availability.principle: The entity tests recovery plan procedures supporting system recovery to meet its objectives.

pof.title: Implements Business Continuity Plan Testing
pof.requirement: Tests response, recovery, and resumption capabilities.

pof.title: Tests Integrity and Completeness of Backup Data

confidentiality.principle: The entity identifies and maintains confidential information to meet the entity's objectives related to confidentiality.

pof.title: Defines and Identifies Confidential information
pof.requirement: Designates confidential information when received or created.

pof.title: Retains Confidential Information
pof.requirement: Retains only as long as necessary for purpose.

confidentiality.principle: The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entity's objectives related to confidentiality.

pof.title: Identifies Confidential Information for Destruction
pof.requirement: Identifies information at end of retention period.

pof.title: Destroys Confidential Information
pof.requirement: Erases or destroys information identified for destruction.

privacy.principle: The entity provides notice to data subjects about its privacy practices to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The notice is updated and communicated to data subjects in a timely manner for changes to the entity's privacy practices, including changes in the use of personal information, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Provides Notice to Data Subjects [C]
pof.requirement: Gives notice before collection or changes to practices.

pof.title: Covers Entities and Activities in Notice [C]
Uses Clear Language and Presents a Current Privacy Notice in a Location Easily Found by Data Subjects [C]

privacy.principle: The entity communicates choices available regarding the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information to the data subjects and the consequences, if any, of each choice. Explicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is obtained from data subjects or other authorized persons, if required. Such consent is obtained only for the intended purpose of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity's basis for determining implicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is documented.

pof.title: Communicates to Data Subjects [C]
pof.requirement: Informs about collection choices and consent requirements.

pof.title: Communicates Consequences of Denying or Withdrawing Consent [C]
Obtains Implicit or Explicit Consent [C]
pof.requirement: Gets consent at collection time and implements preferences.

pof.title: Documents and Obtains Consent for New Purposes and Uses [C]
pof.requirement: Gets consent for new uses of information.

pof.title: Obtains Explicit Consent for Sensitive Information [C]
pof.requirement: Gets explicit consent for sensitive data.

pof.title: Obtains Consent for Data Transfers [C]
pof.requirement: Gets consent before transferring to/from endpoint devices.

privacy.principle: Personal information is collected consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Limits the Collection of Personal Information [P][C]
Collects Information by Fair and Lawful Means [P][C]
pof.requirement: Reviews collection methods for fairness and legality.

pof.title: Collects Information From Reliable Sources [P][C]
pof.requirement: Verifies reliability of third-party data sources.

pof.title: Informs Data Subjects When Additional Information Is Acquired [P][C]

privacy.principle: For information requiring explicit consent, the entity communicates the need for such consent as well as the consequences of a failure to provide consent for the request for personal information and obtains the consent prior to the collection of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Informs Data Subjects of Consequences of Failure to Provide Consent [C]
pof.requirement: Explains consequence of not providing consent.

pof.title: Documents Explicit Consent to Retain Information [C]

privacy.principle: The entity limits the use of personal information to the purposes identified in the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Uses Personal Information for Intended Purposes [P][C]
pof.requirement: Uses information only for intended purposes with proper consent.

privacy.principle: The entity retains personal information consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Retains Personal Information [P][C]
pof.requirement: Retains only as long as necessary for stated purposes.

privacy.principle: The entity securely disposes of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Captures, Identifies, and Flags Requests for Deletion [P][C]
Disposes of, Destroys, and Redacts Personal Information [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity grants identified and authenticated data subjects the ability to access their stored personal information for review and, upon request, provides physical or electronic copies of that information to data subjects to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If access is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial, as required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Permits Data Subjects Access to Their Personal Information [P][C]
Provides Understandable Personal Information Within Reasonable Time [P][C]
Informs Data Subjects If Access Is Denied [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity corrects, amends, or appends personal information based on information provided by data subjects and communicates such information to third parties, as committed or required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If a request for correction is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Permits Data Subjects to Update or Correct Personal Information [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity discloses personal information to third parties with the explicit consent of data subjects and such consent is obtained prior to disclosure to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Communicates Privacy Policies to Third Parties [P][C]
Discloses Personal Information Only When Appropriate [P][C]
Discloses Personal Information Only to Appropriate Third Parties [P][C]
pof.requirement: Discloses only to parties with agreements.

pof.title: Discloses Information to Third Parties for New Purposes and Uses [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of authorized disclosures of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Creates and Retains Record of Authorized Disclosures [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures (including breaches) of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity obtains privacy commitments from vendors and other third parties who have access to personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity assesses those parties' compliance on a periodic and as-needed basis and takes corrective action, if necessary.

pof.title: Evaluates Third-Party Compliance With Privacy Commitments [P][C]
Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party [P][C]
Obtains Commitments to Report Unauthorized Disclosures [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity obtains commitments from vendors and other third parties with access to personal information to notify the entity in the event of actual or suspected unauthorized disclosures of personal information. Such notifications are reported to appropriate personnel and acted on in accordance with established incident-response procedures to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party [P][C]
Reports Actual or Suspected Unauthorized Disclosures [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity provides notification of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Provides Notice of Breaches and Incidents [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity provides data subjects with an accounting of the personal information held and disclosure of the data subjects' personal information, upon the data subjects' request, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Identifies Types of Personal Information and Handling Process [P][C]
Captures, Identifies, and Communicates Requests for Information [P][C]

privacy.principle: The entity collects and maintains accurate, up-to-date, complete, and relevant personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

pof.title: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information [P][C]
Ensures Relevance of Personal Information [P][C]
pof.requirement: Ensures information is relevant for intended use.

privacy.principle: The entity implements a process for receiving, addressing, resolving, and communicating the resolution of inquiries, complaints, and disputes from data subjects and others and periodically monitors compliance to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. Corrections and other necessary actions related to identified deficiencies are made or taken in a timely manner.

Documents and Communicates Dispute Resolution and Recourse [P][C]
Documents and Reports Compliance Review Results [P][C]
Documents and Reports Instances of Noncompliance [P][C]
